languages.text: "Не мог прислать для разговора глашатая получше? Этот барахлит".
"Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."
languages.original_text: "Не мог прислать для разговора глашатая получше? Этот барахлит".

traits.locale_text: "Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."
"Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."
"Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."
"Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."
"Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."
"Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."

languages.text: «¿Es este el mejor servoheraldo que has encontrado para hablar conmigo? No es más que chatarra defectuosa».
languages.original_text: "Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."

traits.locale_text: «¿Es este el mejor servoheraldo que has encontrado para hablar conmigo? No es más que chatarra defectuosa».

languages.text: “这就是你最好的伺服头骨了吗？简直是堆破铜烂铁。”
languages.original_text: "Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."

traits.locale_text: “这就是你最好的伺服头骨了吗？简直是堆破铜烂铁。”

languages.text: « C'est le meilleur servo-émissaire que vous avez pu trouver ? Peuh, ce n'est qu'un vieux tas de ferraille bon pour la casse. »
languages.original_text: "Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."

traits.locale_text: « C'est le meilleur servo-émissaire que vous avez pu trouver ? Peuh, ce n'est qu'un vieux tas de ferraille bon pour la casse. »

languages.text: 「これは、君が{mf|俺|私}に話しかけることのできる最高のサーヴォヘラルドじゃないのか？それはただのゴミだ」
languages.original_text: "Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."

traits.locale_text: 「これは、君が{mf|俺|私}に話しかけることのできる最高のサーヴォヘラルドじゃないのか？それはただのゴミだ」

languages.text: "Benimle konuşmak için bulabildiğin en iyi hizmohaberci bu mu? Hurdaya çıkmış da haberi yok."
languages.original_text: "Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."

traits.locale_text: "Benimle konuşmak için bulabildiğin en iyi hizmohaberci bu mu? Hurdaya çıkmış da haberi yok."

languages.text: "Ist das der beste Servoherold, den Ihr gefunden habt, um mit mir zu reden?" Er ist ein defektes Stück Schrott."
languages.original_text: "Is this the best servo-herald you could find to speak to me? It's a defective piece of rubbish."

traits.locale_text: "Ist das der beste Servoherold, den Ihr gefunden habt, um mit mir zu reden?" Er ist ein defektes Stück Schrott."
